markdown:
{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Captain Teryc Lofell |image = Portrait Captain Rannig Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Captain Teryc Lofell.png |caption = |race = Human |subrace = Meadow |gender = Male |culture = [Aedyr](/aedyr/) |background = |faction = [Príncipi sen Patrena](/principiSenPatrena/) |deity = |personality = |class = Rogue |level = 1 |MIG = 11 |CON = 10 |DEX = 10 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 12 |health = 40 |damage = 13-19 {{pierce}} / 8-12 {{pirece}} |accuracy = 33 / 20 |penetration = 9 / 9 |deflection = 22 |fortitude = 17 |reflex = 30 |will = 24 |dr = 3 |ability = [Fighting Spirit](/fightingSpiritDeadfire/), [Sneak Attack](/sneakAttackDeadfire/), [Crippling Strike](/cripplingStrikeDeadfire/) |location = [Neketaka](/neketaka/), [Serpent's Crown](/serpentsCrown/) (on the bridge in the center) |quests = [The Final Voyage](/theFinalVoyage/)
[Upon New Shores](/uponNewShores/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Vailian Commonwear |neck = Gray Cape |weapon1 = Exceptional Rapier (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Rapier |weapon1_offhand = Stiletto (Deadfire){{!}}Stiletto |weapon2 = Pistol (Deadfire){{!}}Pistol |internalname = NPC_PD_Captain_Lofell |guid = 8c08df69-0e51-40ba-abbb-1659ac313b40 }} '''Captain Teryc Lofell''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background The captain of a Príncipi ship, the ''Antelope'', recently attacked in the midst of an unnatural fog while sailing the waters to the east of Kahanga. Lofell and his boatswain managed to flee the attack on a skiff - though they were stranded near a coast "bristling with the wreckage of other unfortunates". Now shipless and crewless, he's returned to Neketaka to ask for aid, but neither the Queen nor the trading companies will listen. Desperate for any assistance, Lofell fears that his crew will never be seen again. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [The Final Voyage](/theFinalVoyage/) |quests_involved = [Upon New Shores](/uponNewShores/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [The Final Voyage](/theFinalVoyage/): Lofell lost his crew to an attack by ''[The Floating Hangman](/theFloatingHangman/)'' and asks you to "do what you can", should you ever come across them. Before he leaves, he gives you a [Cloak of Protection](/cloakOfProtectionDeadfire/). * [Upon New Shores](/uponNewShores/) ([cut content](/categoryCutContent/)) ## Notes * The captain does not always appear in [Serpent's Crown](/serpentsCrown/), where he stands next to the fountains directly south of the palace. He will only appear if the following conditions are met: ** You haven't already spoken to him before. ** You haven't already started or completed the quest [A Paradise of the Mind](/aParadiseOfTheMind/). ** Not after or during the coup on [Neketaka](/neketaka/) during the quest [The Final Maneuver](/theFinalManeuver/). ** You have spoken with [Eothas](/eothas/) during the quest [He Waits in Fire](/heWaitsInFire/). * In order to force him to appear, you can use the following console commands before entering Serpent's Crown: ::[SetGlobalValue](/consoleSetGlobalValue/) n_SR_Rannig_Quest_Stage 1 ::[SetGlobalValue](/consoleSetGlobalValue/) n_SplinteredReef_Main_Quest_Stage 0 ::[SetGlobalValue](/consoleSetGlobalValue/) b_RDC_Coup_Completed 0 ::[SetGlobalValue](/consoleSetGlobalValue/) b_RDC06_Coup_In_Progress 0 ::[SetGlobalValue](/consoleSetGlobalValue/) n_CP_Magran_Teeth_Resolution 1 [Category:Serpent's Crown characters](/categorySerpentsCrownCharacters/)
raw:
{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Captain Teryc Lofell |image = Portrait Captain Rannig Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Captain Teryc Lofell.png |caption = |race = Human |subrace = Meadow |gender = Male |culture = [[Aedyr]] |background = |faction = [[Príncipi sen Patrena]] |deity = |personality = |class = Rogue |level = 1 |MIG = 11 |CON = 10 |DEX = 10 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 12 |health = 40 |damage = 13-19 {{pierce}} / 8-12 {{pirece}} |accuracy = 33 / 20 |penetration = 9 / 9 |deflection = 22 |fortitude = 17 |reflex = 30 |will = 24 |dr = 3 |ability = [[Fighting Spirit (Deadfire)|Fighting Spirit]], [[Sneak Attack (Deadfire)|Sneak Attack]], [[Crippling Strike (Deadfire)|Crippling Strike]] |location = [[Neketaka]], [[Serpent's Crown]] (on the bridge in the center) |quests = [[The Final Voyage]]
[[Upon New Shores]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Vailian Commonwear |neck = Gray Cape |weapon1 = Exceptional Rapier (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Rapier |weapon1_offhand = Stiletto (Deadfire){{!}}Stiletto |weapon2 = Pistol (Deadfire){{!}}Pistol |internalname = NPC_PD_Captain_Lofell |guid = 8c08df69-0e51-40ba-abbb-1659ac313b40 }} '''Captain Teryc Lofell''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== The captain of a Príncipi ship, the ''Antelope'', recently attacked in the midst of an unnatural fog while sailing the waters to the east of Kahanga. Lofell and his boatswain managed to flee the attack on a skiff - though they were stranded near a coast "bristling with the wreckage of other unfortunates". Now shipless and crewless, he's returned to Neketaka to ask for aid, but neither the Queen nor the trading companies will listen. Desperate for any assistance, Lofell fears that his crew will never be seen again. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [[The Final Voyage]] |quests_involved = [[Upon New Shores]] |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * [[The Final Voyage]]: Lofell lost his crew to an attack by ''[[The Floating Hangman]]'' and asks you to "do what you can", should you ever come across them. Before he leaves, he gives you a [[Cloak of Protection (Deadfire)|Cloak of Protection]]. * [[Upon New Shores]] ([[:Category:Cut content|cut content]]) ==Notes== * The captain does not always appear in [[Serpent's Crown]], where he stands next to the fountains directly south of the palace. He will only appear if the following conditions are met: ** You haven't already spoken to him before. ** You haven't already started or completed the quest [[A Paradise of the Mind]]. ** Not after or during the coup on [[Neketaka]] during the quest [[The Final Maneuver]]. ** You have spoken with [[Eothas]] during the quest [[He Waits in Fire]]. * In order to force him to appear, you can use the following console commands before entering Serpent's Crown: ::[[Console#SetGlobalValue|SetGlobalValue]] n_SR_Rannig_Quest_Stage 1 ::[[Console#SetGlobalValue|SetGlobalValue]] n_SplinteredReef_Main_Quest_Stage 0 ::[[Console#SetGlobalValue|SetGlobalValue]] b_RDC_Coup_Completed 0 ::[[Console#SetGlobalValue|SetGlobalValue]] b_RDC06_Coup_In_Progress 0 ::[[Console#SetGlobalValue|SetGlobalValue]] n_CP_Magran_Teeth_Resolution 1 [[Category:Serpent's Crown characters]]
title: Captain Teryc Lofell
